name: nativescript-wearos-sensors
description: Plugin to develop smartphone apps that receive sensors' data from a paired WearOS smartwatch.

scripts.build: npm run tsc && npm run build.native
scripts.demo.ios: npm i && cd ../demo && tns run ios
scripts.demo.android: npm i && cd ../demo && tns run android
scripts.demo.reset: cd ../demo && npx rimraf -- hooks node_modules platforms package-lock.json
scripts.plugin.prepare: npm run build && cd ../demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-wearos-sensors && tns plugin add ../src
scripts.clean: npm run demo.reset && npx rimraf -- node_modules package-lock.json && npm i
